channel.title: Eventcia
channel.description:
[img]http://s8.postimage.org/4rg4ygax1/Untitled_2.png[/img][img]http://s7.postimage.org/fiivnz5az/Untitled.png[/img] [hr] [b][size=24pt]Introduction[/size][/b] Eventcia is now here in development part. The server will be economic based server. It will be unique because of some features. We are currently working on fixing bugs and make more stable to hold more players then other Project Insanity's servers. There some custom maps and we will probably update more. [hr] [size=24pt][b]Team[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Xion - Developer (artem543)[/li][/ul]
[hr] [size=24pt][b]Updates[/b][/size] [code] DD/MM/YY Name: Description
06/12/11 Xion: Added Hyperion Event system. 06/12/11 Xion: Fixed Client startup errors(Animation.java:1710) 06/12/11 Xion: Small repacking changes 06/12/11 Xion: Added Pathfinding System(Clipping) 06/12/11 Xion: Fixed Compiler directory's 06/12/11 Xion: Fixed Following clipping. 07/12/11 Xion: Added Killamess's Single door system. 07/12/11 Xion: Added Killamess's Double door system. 08/12/11 Xion: Fixed 60 Eclipse Warnings. 08/12/11 Xion: Fixed 4-5 Dupes. 08/12/11 Xion: Added Thieving system (NPC and Stalls).
[/code] [hr] [size=24pt][b]Goals[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Server to hold 300 player no lag.[/li] [li]No 474+ Contents (Cache too Big)[/li] [li]Allot of unique contents.[/li] [li]Unique Quests.[/li] [li]Fully clipped folowing.[/li][/ul]
[hr] [size=24pt][b]Supporters[/b][/size]
[ul][b]Just say Support or Good Luck if you wish want to be here.[/b] [list][li]Native^[/li] [li]Loveandpower[/li] [li]mr extremez[/li] [li]AtomicInt_[/li] [li]TheHolyGrail[/li] [li]RandQm[/li] [li]Ix Soulcist xI[/li] [/list] [hr] [size=24pt][b]Media[/b][/size] [b]More media comming soon.[/b]
[img]http://s7.postimage.org/xegujgbfv/thieving1.png[/img]
[img]http://s11.postimage.org/61ucsd10j/thieving2.png[/img] [hr] [b]Want to be in this project?[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,527094.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,527094.0.html[/url][/ul]

Thank for the suggestion. I am not thinking so i will do remake. Already making called Xalion.

item.title: Eventcia
item.dc:creator: @Sheikyy Sheikyy
item.description:
@Sheikyy wrote:

I’ll vote for remake, cause:
600+ Are really bad, Torva, Vesta, Statius, God swords, Dragon Claws, Well you understand these items fuck the game with the shitty prods.
317-474 Not so bad but most custom servers got Custom Items, Donators and Ridiculous XP Rates.
Remake, I never seen one being finished and damn i want to remember my fucking 8 years old days at 2006

Read full topic

@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:4, topic:424453”]I support, and voted for: Unique, Custom server (317-474 Data)

I will come time-to-time and see what has gone on with this development, hope it doesn’t become a problem as far as me seeing this development fail or something, that would be a saddening moment.[/quote]
Thank you, Give suggestions if needed.

item.title: Eventcia
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Untitled_2.png800×290

[hr]
[size=24pt]Introduction[/size]
Eventcia is now here in development part. The server will be economic based server. It will be unique because of some features. We are currently working on fixing bugs and make more stable to hold more players then other Project Insanity’s servers. There some custom maps and we will probably update more.
[hr]
[size=24pt]Team[/size]

[ul][li]Xion - Developer (artem543)[/li][/ul]

[hr]
[size=24pt]Updates[/size]

DD/MM/YY Name: Description

06/12/11 Xion: Added Hyperion Event system.
06/12/11 Xion: Fixed Client startup errors(Animation.java:1710)
06/12/11 Xion: Small repacking changes
06/12/11 Xion: Added Pathfinding System(Clipping)
06/12/11 Xion: Fixed Compiler directory's
06/12/11 Xion: Fixed Following clipping.
07/12/11 Xion: Added Killamess's Single door system.
07/12/11 Xion: Added Killamess's Double door system.
08/12/11 Xion: Fixed 60 Eclipse Warnings.
08/12/11 Xion: Fixed 4-5 Dupes.
08/12/11 Xion: Added Thieving system (NPC and Stalls).

[hr]
[size=24pt]Goals[/size]

[ul][li]Server to hold 300 player no lag.[/li]
[li]No 474+ Contents (Cache too Big)[/li]
[li]Allot of unique contents.[/li]
[li]Unique Quests.[/li]
[li]Fully clipped folowing.[/li][/ul]

[hr]
[size=24pt]Supporters[/size]

[ul]Just say Support or Good Luck if you wish want to be here.
[list][li]Native^[/li]
[li]Loveandpower[/li]
[li]mr extremez[/li]
[li]AtomicInt_[/li]
[li]TheHolyGrail[/li]
[li]RandQm[/li]

[/list]

[size=24pt]Media[/size]
More media comming soon.
